items.text: similar length, leg side line, flicks off the pads to square leg
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Chandimal, 1 run

items.text: between the keeper and wide slip. But it was deliberate. Just needed to be careful to place it well which he did. Waits at the crease before putting those wrists into play to open the face
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Gunaratne, FOUR runs

items.text: advances down the ground and punches to long-on
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Chandimal, 1 run

items.text: shortish, a bit of width, cut to point
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Gunaratne, no run

items.text: fuller ball, driven back
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Gunaratne, no run

items.text: stays back to a length ball and keeps it out down the pitch
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Gunaratne, no run

items.text: short of a length, keeps low, backs away and punches through the mid-off region
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Gunaratne, 1 run

items.text: again keeps low, around middle this time, whips it to deep midwicket from the crease
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Chandimal, 1 run

items.text: back of a length, keeps low, kept out to the on side from the crease
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Chandimal, no run

items.text: waits for this shortish delivery and opens the face late to guide it to third man
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Chandimal, 1 run

items.text: full, sliding on the pads, clipped away and short fine leg dives to stick out his right hand. Ends up deflecting it away and deep backward square tidies up
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Gunaratne, 2 runs

items.text: good length, puts the head down and blocks into the off side
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Gunaratne, no run

items.text: short of a length, opens the face and runs it down to third man
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Gunaratne, 1 run

items.text: shortish on off, stands in the crease and bunts it into the surface for a quick single
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Chandimal, 1 run

items.text: full and curving in on off, driven to long-off
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Chandimal, 1 run

items.text: gets down for a big slog and ekes it out off the inside of the bat to deep midwicket
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Gunaratne, 1 run

items.text: full, drilled down to long-on
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Chandimal, no run

items.text: advances and meets the pitch of a length ball to block it
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Chandimal, no run

items.text: some width outside off, hangs back and drops it to backward point
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Chandimal, 1 run

items.text: good length on middle, backs away and punches back to the bowler
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Gunaratne, no run

items.text: huge appeal for caught behind from the bowler. But no support from anyone else. Slower short of a length delivery, cuts in off the deck to his the high part of the back pad. Saifuddin is convinced there's an inside edge. Rahim doesn't think so. Could they have opted for the review? No inside edge but lbw could have been close
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Chandimal, no run

items.text: oh, that doesn't matter. Because Chandimal has been run out. Punches it away to long-off and sees a regulation single.Just doesn't account for the sharp, powerful throw from the deep. Shakib charges in and swoops down to fire a direct throw with a stump to aim
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Chandimal, OUT

dismissal.text: LD Chandimal run out (Shakib Al Hasan) 28 (39b 0x4 1x6) SR: 71.79

items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Gunaratne, no run

items.text: just over Rahim. Short of a length, a slower offcutter and Gunaratne tries to swat it away with, what do you call that, a half pull? It's a nothing shot really and gets a top-edge that gets over Rahim behind the stumps
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Gunaratne, FOUR runs

items.text: sprays it on the pads and Gunaratne turns it away fine behind square on the leg side
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Gunaratne, 1 run
